title: China to develop active, healthy online culture
content:
Pupils have computer class at the Jinzhai County primary school in Jinzhai, east China's Anhui Province, Sept. 3, 2019. 
BEIJING, March 5 (Xinhua) -- China will enhance online ideological and ethical progress, according to the draft outline of the 14th Five-Year Plan (2021-2025) for national economic and social development and the long-range objectives through the year 2035.
The country will also develop an active and healthy online culture, it said.
